test_cases.test_name: Verify Study Lifecycle States Configuration
test_cases.objective: To ensure that the study lifecycle states are correctly configured with governance checkpoints as per URS-027-001.
prerequisites: CTMS system is configured and operational
Test study data is available

test_steps.action: Log in to the CTMS system with appropriate credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the study management module.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the study lifecycle states configuration section.
test_steps.expected_result: Study lifecycle states configuration page is displayed.

test_steps.action: Verify the presence of governance checkpoints for each state.
test_steps.expected_result: All governance checkpoints are correctly configured and visible.

acceptance_criteria: All governance checkpoints are correctly configured and visible.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all governance checkpoints are accurately captured and maintained.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Site Activation Workflow
test_cases.objective: To validate that the site activation workflow includes required document checks as per URS-027-002.
prerequisites: CTMS system is configured and operational
Test site data is available

test_steps.action: Log in to the CTMS system with appropriate credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the site management module.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the site activation workflow section.
test_steps.expected_result: Site activation workflow page is displayed.

test_steps.action: Initiate the site activation process and upload required documents.
test_steps.expected_result: Site activation process progresses only after all required documents are uploaded and verified.

acceptance_criteria: Site activation process progresses only after all required documents are uploaded and verified.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all required documents are accurately captured and verified.

test_cases.test_name: Site Activation Workflow Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the site activation workflow correctly enforces document checks and governance approvals.
prerequisites: CTMS configured with site activation workflow
Test user accounts with appropriate roles
Sample site documents for upload

test_steps.action: Log in as a study coordinator and initiate a site activation request.
test_steps.expected_result: System displays the site activation form with required document fields.

test_steps.action: Upload incomplete set of documents and submit the request.
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects submission and highlights missing documents.

test_steps.action: Upload all required documents and submit the request.
test_steps.expected_result: System routes the request to the governance approver.

acceptance_criteria: Workflow enforces document completeness checks
Approval routing follows configured governance rules
Audit trail records all submission attempts
data_integrity_requirements: Document checks must be tamper-proof
Approval chain must be immutable

test_cases.test_name: Investigator Payment Configuration Test
test_cases.objective: Validate that payment rules correctly calculate investigator compensation including tax withholding.
prerequisites: Payment module configured with test milestone rules
Test investigator profiles with tax profiles
Sample visit completion data

test_steps.action: Log in as monitoring lead and mark a payment milestone as achieved.
test_steps.expected_result: System displays calculated payment amount before tax withholding.

test_steps.action: Select investigator with 30% tax withholding requirement.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly deducts 30% from gross payment.

test_steps.action: Generate payment batch for multiple investigators.
test_steps.expected_result: System produces payment report with individual tax calculations.

acceptance_criteria: Milestone rules trigger correct payment amounts
Tax calculations comply with configured rules
Payment reports include audit details
data_integrity_requirements: Payment calculations must be traceable
Tax rules must be consistently applied

test_cases.test_name: Verify Site Activation Workflow with Document Checks
test_cases.objective: To ensure the site activation workflow is correctly configured and enforces required document checks before activation.
prerequisites: CTMS system is configured
Test site data is available
Required documents are uploaded

test_steps.action: Initiate site activation workflow for a test site.
test_steps.expected_result: Workflow starts and prompts for required documents.

test_steps.action: Upload all required documents and submit for review.
test_steps.expected_result: Documents are accepted, and workflow progresses to the next step.

test_steps.action: Complete the workflow and verify site activation.
test_steps.expected_result: Site is activated, and activation status is updated in the system.

acceptance_criteria: Site activation workflow enforces document checks
Site is activated only after all documents are approved
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for site activation process

test_cases.test_name: Validate Monitoring Visit Report Generation
test_cases.objective: To verify that monitoring visit reports are generated within the specified performance threshold.
prerequisites: CTMS system is configured
Monitoring visit data is available
Test user with appropriate permissions

test_steps.action: Log in to the CTMS as a user with monitoring visit report access.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and navigates to the monitoring visit report section.

test_steps.action: Select a monitoring visit and initiate report generation.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generation process starts and completes within 15 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify the generated report for accuracy and completeness.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is accurate, complete, and matches the monitoring visit data.

acceptance_criteria: Monitoring visit reports are generated within 15 seconds
Reports are accurate and complete
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for report generation

test_cases.test_name: Verify Site Activation Workflow Configuration
test_cases.objective: Ensure the site activation workflow is correctly configured with required document checks and governance checkpoints.
prerequisites: Access to CTMS with configured site activation workflow
Test documents for document checks

test_steps.action: Log in to CTMS with a user role that has access to site activation.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and navigates to the site activation module.

test_steps.action: Initiate the site activation process for a test site.
test_steps.expected_result: Site activation process starts and prompts for required documents.

test_steps.action: Upload the required documents and proceed through the workflow.
test_steps.expected_result: Documents are successfully uploaded and workflow progresses to governance checkpoints.

test_steps.action: Complete the governance checkpoints and finalize site activation.
test_steps.expected_result: Site activation is successfully completed and site status is updated.

acceptance_criteria: Site activation workflow correctly prompts for required documents
Governance checkpoints are enforced
Site status is updated upon completion
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all document uploads are logged in the audit trail
Verify site status updates are accurate

test_cases.test_name: Validate Monitoring Visit Report Generation
test_cases.objective: Verify that monitoring visit reports are generated within the specified performance criteria.
prerequisites: Access to CTMS with configured monitoring visit reports
Test data for report generation

test_steps.action: Log in to CTMS with a user role that has access to monitoring visit reports.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and navigates to the monitoring visit report module.

test_steps.action: Select a test monitoring visit and initiate report generation.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generation process starts and completes within 15 seconds.

test_steps.action: Review the generated report for accuracy and completeness.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is accurate and includes all required sections.

acceptance_criteria: Monitoring visit reports are generated within 15 seconds
Reports are accurate and complete
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure report generation time is logged
Verify report content matches source data

test_cases.test_name: Site Activation Workflow with Document Checks
test_cases.objective: Verify that the site activation workflow enforces required document checks before activation.
prerequisites: CTMS system is configured with site activation workflow
Test site and required documents are available

test_steps.action: Log in as a user with site activation permissions.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and navigates to the site activation module.

test_steps.action: Initiate site activation for a test site without uploading required documents.
test_steps.expected_result: System displays an error message and prevents activation until documents are uploaded.

test_steps.action: Upload all required documents and attempt activation again.
test_steps.expected_result: System validates documents and allows site activation to proceed.

acceptance_criteria: Site activation is blocked if required documents are missing.
System validates documents and permits activation upon compliance.
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 compliance for document controls
ICH GCP guidelines for site management
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must record all document uploads and activation attempts.
urs_requirements: URS-027-002: Implement site activation workflow with required document checks.

test_cases.test_name: Investigator Payment Configuration and Tax Withholding
test_cases.objective: Validate that investigator payment rules, including milestone triggers and tax withholding, are correctly configured.
prerequisites: CTMS system is configured with payment rules
Test investigator and payment milestones are set up

test_steps.action: Log in as a user with financial management permissions.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the payment configuration module.

test_steps.action: Trigger a payment milestone for a test investigator.
test_steps.expected_result: System calculates the payment amount and applies configured tax withholding rules.

test_steps.action: Review the payment record and audit trail.
test_steps.expected_result: Payment details and tax withholdings are accurately recorded with a timestamped audit trail.

acceptance_criteria: Payment milestones trigger correctly based on configured rules.
Tax withholding calculations comply with sponsor requirements.
regulatory_basis: Financial compliance with local tax regulations
21 CFR Part 11 for audit trail requirements
data_integrity_requirements: Payment records must be immutable once approved.
urs_requirements: URS-027-005: Configure investigator payments including milestone rules and tax withholding.

test_cases.test_name: Site Activation Workflow with Document Checks
test_cases.objective: Verify that the site activation workflow enforces required document checks before activation.
prerequisites: CTMS system is configured with site activation workflow
Test site records and required documents are available

test_steps.action: Initiate site activation for a test site with incomplete documents.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents activation and displays missing document alerts.

test_steps.action: Upload all required documents and attempt activation again.
test_steps.expected_result: System completes activation and updates site status to 'Active'.

acceptance_criteria: System enforces document completeness before activation
Activation workflow completes successfully with all documents
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 compliance for document controls
data_integrity_requirements: Document verification logs must be maintained

test_cases.test_name: Risk-Based Monitoring KPI Dashboard Functionality
test_cases.objective: Validate that configured risk-based monitoring KPIs display correctly in dashboards.
prerequisites: CTMS with risk-based monitoring module configured
Test study with monitoring data available

test_steps.action: Access the monitoring dashboard as a study manager role.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard displays all configured KPIs with current study data.

test_steps.action: Filter dashboard to show only high-risk sites.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard updates to display only sites meeting risk threshold criteria.

acceptance_criteria: All configured KPIs display accurate data
Dashboard filters function as designed
data_integrity_requirements: KPI calculations must use validated algorithms

test_cases.test_name: Integration with EDC System via API
test_cases.objective: To verify that the CTMS successfully integrates with the Electronic Data Capture (EDC) system using standard APIs.
prerequisites: EDC system is operational
CTMS is configured and operational
API credentials are available

test_steps.action: Configure the CTMS to connect to the EDC system using the provided API credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: CTMS successfully establishes a connection with the EDC system.

test_steps.action: Send a test data payload from the CTMS to the EDC system.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and received by the EDC system.

acceptance_criteria: CTMS successfully integrates with the EDC system
Data integrity is maintained during transmission
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission
Verify data accuracy post-transmission

test_cases.test_name: Role-Based Access Control Verification
test_cases.objective: To ensure that role-based access control (RBAC) is properly configured and enforced for CRO and sponsor users.
prerequisites: CTMS is configured with RBAC
User roles and permissions are defined

test_steps.action: Log in as a CRO user and attempt to access sponsor-specific functionalities.
test_steps.expected_result: CRO user is denied access to sponsor-specific functionalities.

test_steps.action: Log in as a sponsor user and attempt to access CRO-specific functionalities.
test_steps.expected_result: Sponsor user is denied access to CRO-specific functionalities.

acceptance_criteria: RBAC is properly enforced
Users can only access functionalities permitted by their roles
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure unauthorized access is prevented
Verify role-specific permissions

test_cases.test_name: Verify Site Activation Workflow with Document Checks
test_cases.objective: To ensure the site activation workflow correctly enforces document checks as per URS-027-002.
prerequisites: CTMS system configured
Test site data loaded
Required documents uploaded

test_steps.action: Initiate site activation workflow for a test site.
test_steps.expected_result: System prompts for required documents.

test_steps.action: Upload all required documents.
test_steps.expected_result: System validates documents and proceeds to next step.

test_steps.action: Complete site activation workflow.
test_steps.expected_result: Site status changes to 'Activated'.

acceptance_criteria: Site activation workflow enforces document checks
Site status updates correctly
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all documents are correctly validated

test_cases.test_name: Validate Monitoring Visit Report Generation
test_cases.objective: To verify that monitoring visit reports are generated within the specified time frame as per URS-027-013.
prerequisites: CTMS system configured
Monitoring visit data loaded

test_steps.action: Initiate report generation for monitoring visit data.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generation process starts.

test_steps.action: Wait for report generation to complete.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated within 15 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Monitoring visit report is generated within 15 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure report data is accurate

test_cases.test_name: Verify Site Activation Workflow with Document Checks
test_cases.objective: Ensure the site activation workflow correctly enforces required document checks before site activation.
prerequisites: CTMS configured with site activation workflow
Test documents uploaded

test_steps.action: Initiate site activation process for a test site.
test_steps.expected_result: Site activation process starts and prompts for required documents.

test_steps.action: Upload required documents and submit for review.
test_steps.expected_result: Documents are accepted and site activation proceeds to next step.

test_steps.action: Complete site activation process.
test_steps.expected_result: Site is activated and status updated in CTMS.

acceptance_criteria: Site activation workflow enforces document checks
Site status updated correctly
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all documents are correctly linked to site

test_cases.test_name: Validate Monitoring Visit Planning and Reporting
test_cases.objective: Verify that monitoring visit planning, trip reports, and follow-up letters are correctly generated using vendor templates.
prerequisites: CTMS configured with monitoring visit templates
Test monitoring visit data

test_steps.action: Plan a monitoring visit using the CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Monitoring visit is planned and details are saved.

test_steps.action: Generate trip report for the planned visit.
test_steps.expected_result: Trip report is generated using the correct template.

test_steps.action: Generate follow-up letter for the visit.
test_steps.expected_result: Follow-up letter is generated using the correct template.

acceptance_criteria: Monitoring visit planning works correctly
Trip report and follow-up letter templates are correctly applied
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all visit details are correctly captured

test_cases.test_name: Monitoring Visit Report Generation and Compliance Check
test_cases.objective: Verify that monitoring visit reports are generated correctly and comply with regulatory retention policies.
prerequisites: CTMS is configured with monitoring visit templates
Test monitoring visit data is available
User with appropriate permissions is logged in

test_steps.action: Navigate to the monitoring visit section in CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Monitoring visit dashboard is displayed with list of visits.

test_steps.action: Select a completed monitoring visit and generate a trip report.
test_steps.expected_result: Trip report is generated in the correct format with all required fields populated.

test_steps.action: Verify the report is saved and check the audit trail for the report.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is saved and audit trail shows the creation event with timestamp and user.

acceptance_criteria: Monitoring visit reports are generated within 15 seconds.
All required fields in the report are populated correctly.
Audit trail entries are created for report generation and modifications.
data_integrity_requirements: Reports must be immutable once approved.
Audit trail must capture all changes to reports.

test_cases.test_name: Integration with EDC System via API
test_cases.objective: Validate that CTMS can exchange subject visit data with the EDC system using standard APIs.
prerequisites: EDC system is available and configured for integration
Test subject visit data is available in CTMS
API credentials are configured

test_steps.action: Initiate a data sync from CTMS to EDC for subject visit schedules.
test_steps.expected_result: Sync process completes without errors.

test_steps.action: Verify the subject visit data in EDC matches the data in CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: All visit schedules and deviations are correctly reflected in EDC.

test_steps.action: Check the audit trail in both systems for the data exchange.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trails in both systems record the data transfer with timestamps and user IDs.

acceptance_criteria: Data sync completes within 30 seconds for 1000 records.
All subject visit data is accurately transferred to EDC.
Audit trails in both systems reflect the data exchange.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must not be altered during transfer.
Audit trails must be maintained in both systems.
